search.query: | mstats count where `collectd_index` metric_name=* by host | fields host | sort host

| mstats count where `collectd_index` metric_name=df.df_complex.used.value by plugin_instance | search plugin_instance!="dev" plugin_instance!="dev-shm" plugin_instance!="run-*" plugin_instance!="sys-*" plugin_instance!="docker-var-lib-docker*" plugin_instance!="*overlay2*" plugin_instance!="*containers*" | fields - count | rename plugin_instance as partition

chart.title: Storage Increase by Host in GB

search.query: | mstats earliest(_value) as ev latest(_value) as lv where `collectd_index` metric_name=df.df_complex.used.value plugin_instance=$partition$ $hostmultiselect$ by host plugin_instance | eval delta=lv-ev | stats sum(delta) as delta by host | eval deltaGB=round(delta/1024/1024/1024,2) | sort - deltaGB | table host deltaGB

| eval deltaused = used-lastused, size=free+used | stats sum(deltaused) AS deltabytes sum(used) AS usedbytes sum(free) AS freebytes sum(reserved) AS reservedbytes BY host | sort -deltabytes | table host deltabytes usedbytes freebytes reservedbytes | eval deltabytes=`format_bytes(deltabytes)`, freebytes=`format_bytes(freebytes)`, usedbytes=`format_bytes(usedbytes)`, reservedbytes=`format_bytes(reservedbytes)` | search $hostmultiselect$

| mstats earliest(_value) as ev latest(_value) as lv where `collectd_index` metric_name=df.df_complex.used.value plugin_instance=$partition$ $hostmultiselect$ by host metric_name plugin_instance | search ev!=0 OR lv!=0 | eval delta=lv-ev | eval deltaGB=round(delta/1024/1024/1024,2) | table host plugin_instance deltaGB | rename plugin_instance as partition | sort - deltaGB

chart.title: Free vs. Used by Host in GB

search.query: | search $hostmultiselect$ $envmultiselect$ object="$partition$" | chart sum(used) AS totalused sum(free) AS totalfree sum(reserved) AS totalreserved BY host | sort -totalused | eval totalused=round(totalused/1024/1024/1024,2), totalfree=round(totalfree/1024/1024/1024,2), totalreserved=round(totalreserved/1024/1024/1024,2)

table.title: Average Space Used by Host and Partition

search.query: `collectd_index` $hostmultiselect$ $envmultiselect$ metric="df_complex-used" object="$partition$" | stats avg(value) AS bytes BY host object | sort -bytes | eval UsedMem = `format_bytes_new(bytes)`, Partition=replace(object,"df-","/") | table host Partition UsedMem

| mstats latest(_value) as wert where `collectd_index` metric_name=df.df_complex.*.value $hostmultiselect$ plugin_instance=$partition$ by host plugin_instance metric_name | eval partition=host."#".plugin_instance | xyseries partition metric_name wert | convert num(df.df_complex.free.value) as free, num(df.df_complex.used.value) as used | eval pctused=round((used/(used+free))*100,2) | sort - pctused | fields - df* | eval free=`format_bytes(free)` | eval used=`format_bytes(used)` | eval tmpfields=split(partition,"#") | eval host=mvindex(tmpfields,0) | eval partition=mvindex(tmpfields,1) | table host partition used free pctused
